description: A C source file implementing Wi-Fi management frame handling functions, including processing association, authentication, and vendor-specific frames, as well as registering callbacks for Wi-Fi event notifications.

methods.name: int handle_assoc_rsp_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len)
methods.description: Handles association response frames and invokes the registered callback if available.

methods.name: int handle_assoc_req_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len)
methods.description: Handles association request frames and invokes the registered callback if available.

methods.name: int handle_auth_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Handles authentication frames and invokes the appropriate callback based on frame direction.

methods.name: int handle_gas_init_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * public_action_data,UINT len)
methods.description: Processes GAS initial request frames, differentiating based on advertisement protocol ID and calling relevant callbacks.

methods.name: int handle_vendor_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * public_action_data,UINT len)
methods.description: Processes vendor-specific public action frames, particularly DPP frames, and invokes callback if applicable.

methods.name: int handle_public_action_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,wifi_publicActionFrameHdr_t * ppublic_hdr,UINT len)
methods.description: Dispatches public action frames to respective handlers based on action type.

methods.name: int mgmt_frame_received_callback(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,UCHAR * frame,UINT len,wifi_mgmtFrameType_t type,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Main callback for received management frames, routes frames to specific handlers based on type.

methods.name: void wifi_assoc_rsp_frame_callback_register(wifi_sentAssocRspFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for Wi-Fi association response frames.

methods.name: void wifi_assoc_req_frame_callback_register(wifi_receivedAssocReqFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for Wi-Fi association request frames.

methods.name: void wifi_auth_frame_tx_callback_register(wifi_sentAuthFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for Wi-Fi authentication frames (transmit).

methods.name: void wifi_auth_frame_rx_callback_register(wifi_receivedAuthFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback for Wi-Fi authentication frames (receive).

ctags.name: handle_assoc_req_frame
ctags.pattern: /^int handle_assoc_req_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *frame, UINT len) $/

ctags.pattern: /^int handle_assoc_rsp_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *frame, UINT len) $/

ctags.pattern: /^int handle_vendor_public_action_frame(INT ap_index, mac_address_t sta_mac, unsigned char *public/
